subject: Question about shipping origin, VAT and customs fees
description_text:
Hi,



I’m interested in ordering the Pro X Ultimate.

Could you please tell me from where the product will be shipped, and whether I will have to pay any VAT or customs duties on delivery?

My adress is in Germany.

Or should I buy on AliExpress? 



Thank you in advance for your help!



Best regards,

Rico


Von meinem iPhone gesendet

conversations.body_text: Hi Rico Jungmichel,   We have stock available in our Germany warehouse, and for EU orders, we will prioritize shipping from there.
